#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int a[1000010];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(NULL);
	ll int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		int n,k;//n s3ized string & k transformations done on it
		cin>>n>>k;
		string s,r="";//r is the resultant string
		cin>>s;
		int i,t,l=s.length();
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		a[i]=0;
		int prev=0,j=0,x=n,bit,start=0;
		for(i=(l-1);x>0;i--)
		{
			a[j]=prev^(s.at(i)-'0');
			prev=prev^bit^a[j]^a[(j+1)%k];
			
			r=char(a[j]+'0')+r;
			x--;
			j=(j+1)%k;
		}
		cout<<r<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
